titleInfo.title: Letter to William Digges LaTouche and George Abraham, Council at Bussora (Basra) from John Beaumont at Bushire

physicalDescription.extent: The item is damaged and some text is missing.

mods.abstract: Letter reports that Shaikh Sadoon received letters from Carem Cahn [Karim Khan] and Mirza Jaffier instructing him to take particular care of the factory in Bushire and give the English every assistance. The letter stresses the need to provide a present to Mirza Jaffier in return for his support of the English at the court in Persia. Other administrative matters are also discussed.
